name: AR Pop It
description:
AR Pop It  is an AR simulator of pop it, virtual reality in your home, right on your smartphone with an open world.

You can deploy a different reality on the table, floor and even on the wall using your smartphone and a special tag.

AR Pop It can be a new gaming experience for many as it is an augmented reality game. 

AR has tremendous potential in the development of the gaming industry. Your assessment will help us further develop, promote and improve AR. There will also be a huge number of our developments with Augmented Reality. You can follow them on Twiter and other social networks. Link below
